projects.title: bhagat.zone
projects.description: A minimal, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features dark mode, smooth animations, and a clean design. Vibe coded with Claude and Cursor.

projects.title: Swift Examples & Patterns
projects.description: A comprehensive collection of iOS development examples, design patterns, and best practices. Includes MVVM implementations, networking patterns, UI components, and architectural examples.

projects.title: Facebook Like Animation
projects.description: iOS implementation of Facebook's like button animation with smooth transitions and interactive feedback.

projects.title: Moody V2
projects.description: Updated version of Moody app, featuring enhanced mood tracking and analytics capabilities.

projects.title: Rajasthan IT Day
projects.description: Event management and information platform for Rajasthan IT Day celebrations and tech community events.

projects.title: SnowMan
projects.description: A creative iOS application featuring snowman-themed interactions and animations.

projects.title: GIF Demo
projects.description: A guide to use GIFs in an iOS Application. Comprehensive tutorial and examples for implementing animated GIFs.

projects.title: CoreML Demo
projects.description: Demonstration of Core ML integration in iOS applications, showcasing machine learning capabilities on Apple devices.

projects.title: iOS By Example
projects.description: Simple isolated iOS apps for upcoming developers. Practical examples demonstrating iOS development concepts and patterns.

projects.title: CodeFetch Alexa Skill
projects.description: Amazon Alexa skill for fetching and displaying code snippets and programming information through voice commands.

projects.title: ShakeMe iOS
projects.description: iOS application that responds to device shaking gestures with interactive animations and feedback.
